item.title: The numbers are in! Here are just some of the stats for State of the Map 2024 in Nairobi, Kenya: 220 Nairobi attendees 94 venue less participants 54 countries represented 60 speakers 49 sessions - 1 keynote - 35 presentations - 9 workshops - 4 self-organized sessions - 13 poster presentations - 24 lightning talks - 3 pre-events A woman speaks from the podium at State of the Map 2025 in Nairobi, KenyaTwo people speak from the podium at State of the Map 2025 in Nairobi, KenyaA presenter at SotM in Nairobi, Kenya stands before a computer in a darkened roomTwo people lead a discussion in the auditorium at State of the Map, Nairobi, Kenya

a man points at a laptop while others look at the screen in the auditorium at the State of the Map event in Nairobi, Kenya. Thanks again to our platinum sponsors #Microsoft and #TomTom and to our gold sponsor #Esri and to all of our additional sponsors. ğŸ™ Sending gratitude to all of our hardworking volunteers, YOU made this event a success! An OSM board member stands in front of a list of the sponsors for the 2025 State of the Map event

a man points at a laptop while others look at the screen in the auditorium at the State of the Map event in Nairobi, Kenya. Congratulations to State of the Map 2024 for a spectacular event in Nairobi, Kenya last week! Big thanks to the SotM Working Group, OSM Kenya, our sponsors, and all of the attendees for making it such an informative and fun event. #openstreetmap #sotm2024 #stateofthemap #mapping #FOSS4G #OSM people sitting in an auditorium at the University of Nairobi raise their hands to ask questions at the State of the Map event in Nairobi, Kenya.A speaker stands at the podium at the State of the Map event in Nairobi, KenyaAn OSM attendee jumps into the air in front of a sign that says "State of the Map, Nairobi, Kenya 2024"
State of the Map 2024 is over, so it's time to start planning SotM 2025... which will be in Manila, Philippines! ğŸ‰ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotM2024 #SotM2025 #StateOfTheMap

Shout-out to out to our Communications Working Group (CWG) member (and OSM social media team member) Donitar Orishaba who staffed the OSMF table and participated in the OSMF Working Group panel at @sotm in Nairobi this weekend. Representatives of the different groups shared about what each WG does and how they do it. Working Groups are the main way the OSMF supports OSM---and they are a lot of fun, too. >>Learn more about OSM Working Groups: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Working_Groups
State of the Map 2024 is starting today in Nairobi, Kenya. ğŸ™‚ For more details follow @sotm. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #sotm

OSMF Board Election soon! Less than 24 hours to add your question to the curated Q&A list! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Talk:Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board (PS ofc you can ask candidates at any time) #OpenStreetMap #OSM

OSMF Board election soon. ğŸ“£ The deadline to submit a poster to @sotm 2024 is AUGUST 25. ğŸ“£ Don't miss your change to showcase your visualisations using OpenStreetMap data and maps. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/sotm-2024-call-for-posters/

ğŸ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. ğŸ˜ Pictured here are our servers freshly racked up in 2011 and a new database server from 2012. This would be our last spinning rust (mechanical hard disk) database server. 36 drive bays! Future database servers used SSD disks. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a rack of computer serversa computer server sitting on a sack truck, outside

ğŸ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. ğŸ˜ Here's Matt Amos in 2009 after we re-organised our server racks. Server lower middle left (with blue disk caddies) was our new database server installed earlier in the year. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a white man, with black hair working in a server room

ğŸ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. ğŸ˜ Here's @gravitystorm at the rear of server racks in UCL after a long work session in 2009 extending our rack depth and re-organising our servers. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a white man with ginger hair, in a server room, looking at some server cables

ğŸ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! Today is OSM's 20th Brithday! ğŸ‚ ğŸ‚ Here's SteveC's desktop at University College London, the original OSM "server" until 2006. You've come a long way in the last 20 years. ğŸ˜ https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenSource #OpenStreetMap #OSM photo of an old battered desktop computer. It looks grimey, has a floppy disk and CD drive, and a peeled off sticker on it

"OpenStreetMap has grown exponentially or quadratically over the last twenty years depending on the metric youâ€™re interested in...The story isnâ€™t so much about the data and technology, and it never was. Itâ€™s the people. " -- Steve Coast, reflecting on 20 years of OpenStreetMap on the OSM blog https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/08/09/openstreetmap-at-20/ #20YearsofOSM #HappyBirthdayOSM

Less than a week left to nominate yourself as a candidate for the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors! Or to convince someone you know to run! Have you considered running? ğŸ™‚ All info here: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board#Board_candidates #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation
We are aware of the current website and API outage. Our community forum at https://community.openstreetmap.org is online.

You might be wondering, why is cake such a part of OSM anniversary celebrations? At OSM's "Mapchester" mapping party in Manchester, UK in 2006, a "cake diagram" was used to split the project into logical sectors with sector references. https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ A "cake diagram" for the Mapchester mapping event.

It's time to choose the next group of board members for the OSMF. Submission of self-nominations for the 2024 OSMF board election is open. https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board#Submission_of_self-nominations (Please read the eligibility requirements!) ğŸ“£ Deadline: 13 August 2024, 23:59:59 UTC

Have you listed your local event on the OSM 20th Birthday wiki and the website yet? ğŸ‘‰ 20th anniversary event wiki: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OpenStreetMap_20th_Anniversary_Birthday_party ğŸ‘‰ 20th anniversary event map, timeline and birthday card: http://birthday20.openstreetmap.org
